title: Famous People Get Special Awards for Helping Others
summary: In the New Year Honours, many famous people received awards for their good work. Actor Idris Elba became a knight because he helps young people through his charity, the Elba Hope Foundation, which fights knife crime. England women's football coach Sarina Wiegman became a dame after her team won the European Championships. Other football players like Leah Williamson got awards too. Figure skaters Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean also became a dame and knight. Comedian Meera Syal became a dame for her shows and books. These awards celebrate people who make a difference in sports, entertainment, and charity.

background_read: The New Year Honours are special awards given by the King or Queen in the UK every year to people who have done amazing things for their country or community. They include titles like knight, dame, MBE, and OBE. These awards recognize people from all areas like sports, entertainment, and charity work. For example, knights and dames are high honors for helping others, while MBEs and OBEs are for important contributions. It's a way to say thank you to those who make the world a better place.
